long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reveal Passwords with a Hover

Have you ever deleted an entire password just because you mistyped a single character?

Now, you can avoid that hassle.

This extension displays passwords in plain text when the cursor hovers over password fields.

You can also customize the trigger for showing passwords in the options menu.
